    Visualize diffusion

    FeaturePlot_diffusion.Rd

    Visualize diffusion

    FeaturePlot_diffusion(
  coord,
  init_state,
  P_ls = NULL,
  W = NULL,
  check_time = NULL,
  gene_name = NULL,
  gene_color = "blue"
)

    Arguments

    coord

    matrix; 2D coordinate of cells for visualization

    init_state

    matrix; Row-wise normalized expression matrix

    P_ls

    matrix; Diffused transition matrix

    W

    matrix; Symmetry affinity matrix of kNN graph

    check_time

    vector; Select several time point for visualization, e.g. c(2,16,128)

    gene_name

    string; Select one gene for visualization

    gene_color

    string; The color of expression level for visualization

    Value

    A ggplot object

    Examples
